speaker: Archmage
lines: Why have you come? In search of power or wisdom?
The path of the mage is fraught with peril, but the rewards are great.
I see potential in you. But the road ahead is not easy.
But every wizard who comes to the college must answer a question.
When the world is silent and only the Weave replies, what do you ask of it?

choices.text: Grant me power enough to bend the storm.
Show me the hidden name beneath all names.
Teach me balance, that I might wield without ruin.
